channel.title: How do I create runescape offline?
channel.description:
I see everyone using all sources but the main source from runescape, it's simple to host just how do people get hold of the sources and the npc spawn ID's and such?
Can you post your *helpful* comments and tips for me as to how I go about obtaining the source?

item.title: How do I create runescape offline?
item.dc:creator: @Venomous Venomous`
item.description:
@Venomous wrote:

chrisbevan:

please can you link me this info or point me into some direction of more information on this offline version please?

First of all, you want to go to http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,49.0.html and download a server that doesn’t have 1,000 people saying “Virus” or “Shitty”.
Then, you go to google.com and enter in whatever you want to find out.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I create runescape offline?

item.title: How do I create runescape offline?
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

Jagex does plan to create an offline version of RuneScape and it will affect your online character. This will be released in RS3.

Read full topic
